eu.wauz.wauzcore

Class WauzCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
      • org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        • eu.wauz.wauzcore.WauzCore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter, org.bukkit.command.TabExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin

    public class WauzCore
extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
    The main class of the plugin and holder of system information. Initializes all static data, listerners, API and repeating tasks. When the server stops it will clean it up again.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • onEnable

        public void onEnable()
        Gets called when the server is started. 1. Initializes the loader to load all the static data. 2. Registers the event listeners. 3. Sets up the web based API. 4. And finally starts all repeating tasks.
        Specified by:
        onEnable in interface org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
        Overrides:
        onEnable in class org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        See Also:
        WauzLoader, WebServerManager

      • onDisable

        public void onDisable()
        Gets called when the server is stopped. 1. Closes the web based API. 2. Logs out all players. 3. And closes all active instances.
        Specified by:
        onDisable in interface org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
        Overrides:
        onDisable in class org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        See Also:
        WauzPlayerRegistrator.logout(Player), InstanceManager.closeInstance(World)

      • onCommand

        public boolean onCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                         org.bukkit.command.Command cmd,
                         java.lang.String label,
                         java.lang.String[] args)
        Listens for incoming commands from the plugin.xml. Redirects the needed informtation to the command executor.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
